definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Creating integrated leveled and block-based LOD models.
sentences.chinese: 构造完整的分级分块LOD模型。

sentences.english: So, in effect, the act of degree classification trivialises the student's achievement.
sentences.chinese: 因此，学位分级制度实际上轻视了学生的学习成绩。

sentences.english: Owner drawn controls and sub classing in WTL if you want to understand the source.
sentences.chinese: 所有者绘制控制和在WTL分级分，如果你想了解源。

sentences.english: The TBR CLASS used for transaction processing is defined in the TTR.
sentences.chinese: 用于交易进程处理的TBR分级被定义在TTR中。

sentences.english: If we recover the waste materials through grading recovery, we can create these renewable resources.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们开展分级回收，就能够创造这些再生资源。

sentences.english: The electricity price shall be based on the principle of uniform policy, unified pricing and be regulated at different levels.
sentences.chinese: 电价实行统一政策，统一定价原则，分级管理。

sentences.english: Graduate the volume from pianissimo to fortissimo .
sentences.chinese: 音量从极弱到最强的分级。

sentences.english: In Chinese date grading, the color is a most appearance-quality index to consider.
sentences.chinese: 红枣的颜色是红枣分选分级的重要外在品质指标之一。

sentences.english: Black teas are graded by leaf size and by where they are grown.
sentences.chinese: 红茶由叶大小进行分级，由他们在哪里长大。

sentences.english: Students according to grade placement test scores.
sentences.chinese: 根据学生的考试成绩分班分级。

sentences.english: A simple system has been developed for the clinical grading of the presence and severity of lens opacities.
sentences.chinese: 晶体混浊及严重程度有一简单的临床分级方法。

sentences.english: The severity and the chronicity of the slips were graded.
sentences.chinese: 并对滑脱的严重性和慢性化程度进行了分级。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the predictive effect of classification of liver function in patients by Akoi's disconnective operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估肝功能分级指标对断流手术预后的预测作用。

sentences.english: Movie gradation Cist the development and transformation of movie examination.
sentences.chinese: 分级制是电影审查制的延续和变型。

sentences.english: Degree classification has a long history in our universities.
sentences.chinese: 学位分级制度在英国大学中拥有悠久的历史。

sentences.english: Experimental results proved the multi-view scalability performance of the proposed scheme.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果验证了该方案的多视点可分级性。

definition: to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated
